response.original_title: God So Loved the World: Carols of Christmas
response.overview: Performed by the Mormon Tabernacle Choir. Besides the title hymn, it includes, "Joy to the World," "Whence Is That Goodly Fragrance Flowing" "The Virgin Mary Had a Baby Boy," "What Shall We Give to the Babe in the Manger" "Ding Dong Merrily on High," and "The First Noel."

production_companies.name: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints

response.title: God So Loved the World: Carols of Christmas
